import React, {useState} from 'react' import './ReservationCard.sass' import {Button} from '../index' import classNames from 'classnames' function ReservationCard({dark, light}) { const [name, setName] = useState('') const [surname, setSurname] = useState('') const [date, setDate] = useState('') const [message, setMessage] = useState('') const valueToState = (e) => { const name = e.target.name const value = e.target.value switch(name){ case 'name': setName(value) break case 'surname': setSurname(value) break case 'date': setDate(value) break case 'message': setMessage(value) break default: break } } const submitForm = (e) => { console.log(e) } return (
Резервування столику
) } export default ReservationCard
